instructions: If A1a = NO → set A1b = NO and jump to A2a
If A2a = NO → set A2b = NO and jump to A3a_recent
If A1b OR A2b = YES → explore both current and past episode items
If A1b AND A2b = NO → explore only past-episode items
Count each A3* group as positive if any response = YES
Assess A4 separately for current and past episodes
If A5 = YES → code recurrent; between episodes must be ≥2 months symptom-free
Diagnosis requires ≥5 symptoms (A3 groups), plus A1b or A2b = YES, plus A4 = YES, plus organic causes ruled out

questions.prompt: Were you ever depressed or down, or felt sad, empty or hopeless most of the day, nearly every day, for two weeks?
For the past two weeks, were you depressed or down, or felt sad, empty or hopeless most of the day, nearly every day?
Were you ever much less interested in most things or much less able to enjoy the things you used to enjoy most of the time, for two weeks?
In the past two weeks, were you much less interested in most things or much less able to enjoy the things you used to enjoy most of the time?
(Past 2 weeks) Was your appetite decreased or increased nearly every day, or did your weight change by ±5% without trying?
(Past episode) Was your appetite decreased or increased nearly every day, or did your weight change by ±5% without trying?
(Past 2 weeks) Did you have trouble sleeping nearly every night (difficulty falling asleep, early-morning waking, or sleeping excessively)?
(Past episode) Did you have trouble sleeping nearly every night?
(Past 2 weeks) Did you talk or move more slowly than normal, or were you restless/fidgety almost every day? Did anyone notice?
(Past episode) Did you talk or move more slowly than normal, or were you restless/fidgety almost every day?
(Past 2 weeks) Did you feel tired or without energy almost every day?
(Past episode) Did you feel tired or without energy almost every day?
(Past 2 weeks) Did you feel worthless or guilty almost every day?
questions.followUp: If YES, ask for examples of delusional guilt/worthlessness (failure, disease, death, nihilistic content).

questions.prompt: (Past episode) Did you feel worthless or guilty almost every day?
questions.followUp: If YES, ask for examples of delusional guilt/worthlessness.

questions.prompt: (Past 2 weeks) Did you have difficulty concentrating, thinking, or making decisions almost every day?
(Past episode) Did you have difficulty concentrating, thinking, or making decisions almost every day?
(Past 2 weeks) Did you repeatedly think about death, have thoughts or plans of killing yourself, or attempt suicide?
(Past episode) Did you repeatedly think about death, have thoughts or plans of killing yourself, or attempt suicide?
(Current episode) Did these symptoms cause significant distress or problems and represent a change from your previous functioning?
(Past episode) Did these symptoms cause significant distress or problems and represent a change from your previous functioning?
Between depressive episodes, did you ever have an interval of ≥ 2 months without significant depression or loss of interest?
How many episodes of depression have you had in your lifetime? (≥ 2 months between episodes required.)

mustHave: At least 5 symptom groups (A3a–A3g) coded YES
